about_the_game:
Are you ready to be a part of a spy game?! Join the spy couple to reveal the mystery of a tricky story. Investigate 12 different locations to find elusive evidence! Complete quests and find clues and leads to solve the mystery!

You’ll encounter many difficult card deals on your journey! But you can handle them!

- The Spies needs your help!
- Solitaire card game – collect chains of cards!
- Never a dull moment with super exciting levels!
- Vivid graphics and a Pirate soundtrack make this Solitaire a win-win!
- Get rid of cards faster with jokers, and increase the combo multiplier to earn more coins!
- Earn achievements and get all 15 clues and leads!
- Let the fun take over!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:

  • Processor: 1500 MHz
  • Memory: 512 MB RAM
  • DirectX: Version 9.0

  • Memory: 1024 MB RAM
